description: The garden sat idle for some time before being rebuilt by new founders. The front area outside of the gate will have a tree planted in the central planter.  The garden is divided into two sections - the back area is reserved for recreation and the front area is for the garden plots.
name: Brooklyn Bears/Rockwell Place Garden
previous_use: vacant lot - the site was a garden before, however the space sat idle until 2008 when the new founders started the rebuilding process.
